Nightlight::

she moved close to Aerotaur "I remember clear that" she said "I was 
trying to avoid his attacks and something hit me in my back, I lost 
the control and started to fall... after that all things are 
cofused... " she interrupted and looking to Aerotaur while she put 
her hand in his shoulder "Are you sure that you're ok?"

She was worried for him, and she didn't know why, something inside 
her made her feel worried for his wounds.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Hmm?  Wounds?"  He looks down at his chest.  "I had forgotten 
all about 
> those (I really did).  They don't hurt much.  I've been worried 
about you, 
> you collapsed just after I got back.  I know you're right I 
couldn't have 
> known but I should have come faster.  They're both gone now.  
Perplex took 
> care of one and the other I last saw fleeing with one arm missing."
